# Build Model
model = Sequential([
# 1st Conv layer    
        Conv2D(1024, kernel_size = (3, 3), padding = 'same', activation = 'relu', input_shape = (28,28,1)),
        Conv2D(1024, kernel_size = (3, 3), padding = 'same', activation = 'relu', input_shape = (28,28,1)),

        MaxPool2D(pool_size = (2, 2)),
        Dropout(0.2),

# 2nd Conv layer        
        Conv2D(256, kernel_size = (3, 3), activation = 'relu', padding = 'same'),
        Conv2D(256, kernel_size = (3, 3), activation = 'relu', padding = 'same'),
    
        MaxPool2D(pool_size = (2, 2)),
        Dropout(0.2),

# Fully Connected layer        
        Flatten(),        
        Dense(256, activation = 'relu'),
        Dropout(0.25),    
        Dense(num_classes, activation = 'softmax')
  
    ])

model.summary()
